pageContext.claim: “Best location. Right next to the airport, Miami International -- one of the biggest airports in the world. Some people say it’s the biggest.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump defended his now-abandoned decision to hold the Group of Seven summit at the Trump National Doral resort, but he needs to get his airport rankings straight. Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport is No. 1 in the world by passenger volume, with more than 100 million passengers, but Miami does not even rank in the top 20. In 2017, it ranked 40th, according to the Airports Council International.
